input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Ledge Lounger"
Reference Product Name: "Signature Chaise"
Reference Product Description:
The Signature Chaise Lounger is the perfect companion for ultimate relaxation on your pool’s sun shelf, tanning ledge, baja shelf, sun deck, or any flat surface submerged in 0-9” of water. Its ergonomic design and water-friendly materials provide unparalleled comfort and support, allowing you to bask in the sun while enjoying a refreshing dip at the same time. Its curves are designed to conform to your body’s natural contours for your complete comfort. At the same time, the chaise’s timeless simplicity and clean aesthetic add a touch of elegance to your poolside scene, while its durable construction lets it stand up against all the elements.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Aqua Outdoors In- Pool Chaise Set'
  - Name='Aqua Outdoors Luxury In- Pool Chaise Lounge Set'
  - Name='In- Pool Affinity Square Sunbed Ledge Lounger'
  - Name='Ledge Lounger Signature Chair and Side Table In-Pool Set'
  - Name='In- Pool Signature Sectional Corner Ledge Lounger'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Aqua Outdoors In- Pool Chaise Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This product is a set of in-pool chaise loungers, directly comparable to the reference product in both intended use (in-pool sun shelf) and silhouette/construction. The only potential difference is whether it is sold as a set, but the core function and shape match extremely closely.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Aqua Outdoors Luxury In- Pool Chaise Lounge Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This set is described as a luxury in-pool chaise lounge, which directly mirrors the purpose, silhouette, and construction of the reference product. The main difference is the possible addition of 'luxury' features not detailed here, but functionally it is nearly identical.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: In- Pool Affinity Square Sunbed Ledge Lounger
scores_with_rationales.rationale: While this product is also designed for in-pool use on a ledge and shares water-compatible construction, its 'square sunbed' descriptor suggests a different silhouette (flatter and possibly larger, more bed-like), which makes it less directly comparable than a standard chaise lounge.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ledge Lounger Signature Chair and Side Table In-Pool Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Although intended for in-pool use on a ledge, this is a chair (not a chaise lounge) with a side table. The shape and function (upright seating instead of lounging/reclining) differ substantially from the reference chaise, but still serve a similar poolside relaxation purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: In- Pool Signature Sectional Corner Ledge Lounger
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a sectional corner piece for an in-pool ledge, likely featuring very different dimensions and intended for use as part of a larger configuration rather than as a standalone chaise lounger. It shares in-pool, ergonomic, and water-friendly features but differs in silhouette and primary function.
